content:
Catholic Diocese of Raleigh cancels weekend Masses, closes schools due to coronavirus
Roy Cooper banned large gatherings in an effort to slow the spread of coronavirus. On Saturday afternoon, Cooper issued an executive order requiring public schools to be closed until March 27 and stopping mass gatherings of more than 100 people.
Raleigh News & Observer • 3/14/2020
Here’s where you can find free meals for children during this week’s school closures
Many school districts in San Diego County will provide free sack meals to any child during the upcoming coronavirus school closures that are starting Monday. Generally, schools are providing meals to children 18 and younger,
San Diego Union-Tribune • 3/14/2020
Coronavirus in Ohio: All Cincinnati Public Schools now closed on Monday
All Cincinnati Public Schools will now be closed this Monday, according to a message posted on the district's website on Saturday night. Throughout the day, the district had been announcing certain school buildings would be closed on Monday.
Cincinnati Enquirer • 3/14/2020
CNY schools announce closings due to coronavirus pandemic
Onondaga County Executive Ryan McMahon announced Saturday that all Onondaga County schools will close Friday, March 20 due to the coronavirus pandemic and remain closed through at least April 13. In response, several school districts in the Central New York area are deciding to close Monday or other days next week or to start online learning.
syracuse.com • 3/14/2020
School districts’ schedules change in the Washington region as a result of the coronavirus outbreak
The following is a list of school closures in the Washington region and changes to local government operations during the coronavirus pandemic: Known coronavirus cases in D.C., Maryland and Virginia Alexandria City Public Schools will close from March 16 through April 13. Anne Arundel County Public Schools will close through March 27 ...
Washington Post • 3/14/2020
Grand Rapids Schools opening student meal sites during statewide coronavirus closures
GRAND RAPIDS, MI -- Grand Rapids Schools leaders announced plans to open “grab and go” meal sites for students after the statewide closure of public schools because of the coronavirus. Administrators announced that several nutrition stations would be open daily from 11:30 a.m. to 12:30 p.m. Monday through Friday for students 18 years old ...
MLive • 3/14/2020
Coronavirus in California: School Districts Closed
Saturday: California’s largest school districts have shut down, affecting more than 1,000,000 students across the state.
New York Times • 3/14/2020
Gov. Evers orders closure of public schools across Wisconsin
"Keeping our kids, our educators, our families, and our communities safe is a top priority as we continue our work to respond to and prevent further spread of COVID-19 in Wisconsin,” the governor said, referring to the disease the caused by the coronavirus. At least nine other states have closed schools in response to the virus' spread ...
San Francisco Chronicle • 3/14/2020
Smart move or grave mistake? NYC keeps schools open amid coronavirus outbreak
The city has confirmed coronavirus cases in at least two public school students and at least one teacher. Their schools have been closed for cleaning but are expected to reopen. For most people, the virus causes only mild or moderate symptoms, such as fever and cough. For some, especially older adults and people with existing health problems ...
The Boston Globe • 3/14/2020
CNY schools are scrambling to figure out how to feed kids if coronavirus shuts them down
Syracuse, N.Y. -- What happens to the thousands of kids who depend on Central New York school districts for their breakfast and lunch if the coronavirus pandemic forces schools to shut down ... Figuring out where and how kids will gets those meals is part of the district’s closure plan, said spokeswoman Karin Davenport.
syracuse.com • 3/14/2020
Coronavirus closes schools in Pa., but local districts will decide which staff must show up
While Gov. Tom Wolf has closed all schools in Pennsylvania for two weeks due to the coronavirus pandemic, some employees have wondered if they need to show up to work. And while the governor’s order makes it clear students can’t show up at school for two weeks, local schools will make the decision on which essential staff should report to ...
Penn Live • 3/14/2020
Two Rivers district closes six schools; Health official says more closures are ahead
The closure of the state’s K-12 schools has been a point of concern for many as the outbreak of the new coronavirus has grown in Vermont. Senate President Pro Tem Tim Ashe, D-Chittenden, said during the legislative meeting that lawmakers have been receiving “nervous communications” from parents about when the governor will move to ...
VTDigger • 3/14/2020
El Dorado County closing all school districts at least a week to fight coronavirus spread
Rescue Union Elementary and Silver Fork Elementary The districts will reassess at the end of the week to decide whether an extension of school closures will be needed, officials said. Health officials said no one in the county has tested positive for COVID-19, the disease caused by the new coronavirus, but the El Dorado County Public Health ...
Sacramento Bee • 3/14/2020
North Carolina governor orders schools closed for 2 weeks
North Carolina joins more than half a dozen other states in ordering statewide school closings — including Virginia, Maryland, Florida, Illinois and Washington state — as officials try to slow the spread of coronavirus. Colleges and universities around the country have also suspended on-campus instruction, extended spring break, or both.
WRAL • 3/14/2020
Liberty County school districts cancel class to thwart coronavirus
On Friday, school districts around Liberty and San Jacinto counties made their decisions to close to prevent the spread of the virus. Only one district remains open, Shepherd ISD in San Jacinto County,
Houston Chronicle • 3/14/2020
Why is school canceled? Because rapid coronavirus spread could break Alabama’s health care system
The novel coronavirus, COVID-19, is in Alabama ... Estimates project that if drastic measures hadn’t been taken, if events were not cancelled and schools not closed, then 40 to 70 percent of the U.S. population could be infected. Let’s be conservative and say that 50 percent in Alabama contract it. That’s 2.5 million people.
al.com • 3/14/2020
Coronavirus: Gov. Charlie Baker does not order statewide closure of public schools over COVID-19
noted different states and communities are handling the “difficult issue” of school closures in varied ways. Baker earlier this week banned gathering or organizing events of more than 250 people in an effort to help prevent the spread of the disease, which has infected more than 2,000 and killed at least 50 in the U.S. On Saturday ...
MassLive • 3/14/2020
Zoom Is Helping Schools Closing Due to Coronavirus -- for Free
governments and school boards across the country are making the difficult decision to close schools, the result of the outbreak of COVID-19 illness caused by the SARS-CoV-2 coronavirus. Zoom Video Communications (NASDAQ:ZM) is stepping in to help. The company announced yesterday that it was providing its videoconferencing tools to K-12 schools ...
The Motley Fool • 3/14/2020
New Jersey’s first testing center to open as state plans for school closures
New Jersey now has 69 coronavirus cases after 19 new patients tested positive in the past 24 hours, Gov. Phil Murphy said Saturday, as the first public testing center was set to open and planning continued for widespread school closures. The governor, announcing the news on a briefing call with reporters, also said he spoke to Vice President ...
Politico • 3/14/2020
SoCal Public School Closures
Schools across Southern California have shut down for at least two weeks as a precaution against the coronavirus pandemic. Here is a list of school districts by county that are closed and expected reopening dates. Note that the dates can change as conditions change. So be sure to double check with your local district for the latest information.
NBC Los Angeles • 3/14/2020
Elgin-area schools to close through March to slow the coronavirus
[Most read] Coronavirus in Illinois updates: Here’s what’s happening Saturday ... so the last student attendance day is currently scheduled for Friday, May 22.” Catholic schools in the Elgin area will be closed effective Monday and “until further notice,” the Rockford Diocese announced Friday morning. Student class instruction will ...
Chicago Tribune • 3/14/2020
Coronavirus: PBC schools are closed but 30 campuses will give free meals to kids
Even though classes are canceled next week in Palm Beach County public schools over coronavirus concerns, 30 campuses will distribute free breakfasts and lunches to children. Bag meals will be available at the 30 schools Monday through Friday from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m. Each bag will include one breakfast and one lunch. Only minors are eligible to ...
Palm Beach Post • 3/14/2020
Coronavirus: Stephen Curry, wife use foundation to help feed out-of-school students during COVID-19 outbreak
NBA players and their families continue to step up to help out those negatively impacted by the outbreak of the coronavirus, including children that may be without meals due to school closures. On Friday,
CBSSports.com • 3/14/2020
D.C., Md. and Va. schools offer learning plans, free meals for students during coronavirus closures
Area schools are closed for at least two weeks due to the coronavirus outbreak, but many are providing students with lessons to keep their skills sharp as well as free meals to keep them fed. From March 24 to March 31, students will take part in distance learning. Public schools in D.C. have prepared resources for every level from pre ...
WTOP News • 3/14/2020
Coronavirus: NI 'school closures will last for at least 16 weeks'
When schools shut in Northern Ireland over coronavirus it will be for at least 16 weeks ... with the first and deputy first minister both still split over the issue of school closures. Deputy First Minister Michelle O'Neill repeated her call for them to be shut immediately, in line with the Republic of Ireland. Speaking after the meeting ...
BBC • 3/14/2020
Senegal orders all schools closed in response to coronavirus
Senegal’s President Macky Sall on Saturday ordered all schools and universities closed for the next three weeks and religious festivals canceled in response to a coronavirus outbreak that has infected 24 people in the past two weeks.
Reuters • 3/14/2020
Steph and Ayesha Curry are helping to provide 1 million meals to Oakland students who can't attend school due to coronavirus closures
Steph and Ayesha Curry are urging people to donate to food banks to help feed students who usually rely on school for meals. The Golden State Warriors guard and his wife, Ayeesha Curry, are teaming up with a food bank to provide more than 1 million meals to students in Oakland who cannot attend schools due to coronavirus shutdowns.
CNN • 3/14/2020
Coronavirus identified in parent/guardian of Amherst Regional High School student
the disease caused by the coronavirus. “No additional steps have been recommended for us to take at this time since the schools have already been closed for the next two weeks with plans to complete enhanced cleaning during that time,” Superintendent of Schools Michael Morris wrote in a statement. Amherst-Pelham Regional School District is ...
MassLive • 3/14/2020
With waiver of 180 school days, more school closures, shifting focus to meals, childcare
Westport joins Region 14 and Stratford school districts as the latest to keep students home amid growing fears about exposure to the coronavirus.
Hartford Courant • 3/14/2020
Coronavirus: Northern Ireland schools 'will close for at least 16 weeks'
First minister Arlene Foster confirms schools will close at some point – but not immediately
The Guardian • 3/14/2020
